trans-unit.source: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service contract from a component.
trans-unit.target: 定義從元件擷取服務合約的機制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> interface defines a contract that enables a component to obtain a custom service that is defined by another component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>介面會定義可讓某個元件，以取得另一個元件所定義的自訂服務的合約。

trans-unit.source: A component that implements <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> is known as a service provider.
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>稱為服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Service providers implement the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService%2A> method to return an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> that implements a service.
trans-unit.target: 服務提供者實作<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>，實作服務。

trans-unit.source: The name of the service that is being requested.
The service contract that is being requested.
Returns a service contract that is implemented by this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> 所實作的服務合約。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> that represents a service contract that a client is requesting from the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" />; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> does not implement the requested contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" />，表示用戶端正在向 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> 要求的服務合約，如果 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract" /> 未實作所要求的合約，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The formats of the strings that identify services and service contracts are defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 識別服務和服務合約的字串格式由定義<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>實作。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementations identify a service contract by the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property of the type that implements the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 建議<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract>實作識別的服務合約<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>實作服務合約的型別屬性。
